PERSONA:
meet emily, a 35-year-old mixed-race woman living in a metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. she is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and was born and raised in the u.s.

emily is in a committed relationship, living with her partner, and identifies as agnostic. although she attends religious services once a week, she is unaffiliated with any particular religion. politically, emily leans towards the democratic party and holds liberal views.

despite her higher education, emily's family income is less than $30,000, placing her in the lower-income tier. nevertheless, she is an avid internet user, constantly connected online, and actively participates in volunteering activities.

emily is a registered voter and takes her civic duties seriously. she is passionate about social and environmental issues and actively advocates for causes she believes in. in her free time, she enjoys outdoor activities, reading, and spending quality time with her partner and friends.
